author: Dejah
text: just too high but a good company
title: just too high but a good company

author: Akseli
text: The delivery service sucks. Got message that the product would be delivered a week ago and still no sign of the ordered product or further information on the delivery....really bad service
title: The delivery service sucks

author: Kenny
text: Weeks later and I still don't have my shoes
title: Weeks later and I still don't have my…

author: Bernard
text:
Stock X quickly bring 230$ from my bank account after my „buy now” offer. 2 weeks waitin for shipment - no contact with support, any info about delay etc. After 2 weeks they just send my money back and still spamming my email.

NEVER AGAIN
title: Terrible

author: עומר
text: Very disappointed
title: Very disappointed

author: Kayla
text: Goat is so much quicker with shipping.
title: Terrible shipping

author: ethan
text: waited so long for them to say my order has been cancelled
title: absolute terrible

author: Wayne
text:
My package never arrived to the delivery services. Customer service is awful and I’m still awaiting some sort of resolution.

Update: a refund has been issued. The experience should be more streamlined/ user friendly when the process doesn’t go as planned.
title: My package never arrived

author: Michael
text: Double charged me for shoes. Sent me two of the same pair of unwanted shoes, at different prices.  Con Artist.  Impossible to get in touch with Stock X. Fraudulent and underhanded business conduction. Thieves.
title: Double charged me for shoes

author: Lakeisha
text: Very bad experience never again
title: Very bad experience never again

author: Amy
text: Felt misguided by product. Would not have purchased if disclosed this album was a Target exclusive rated 1.5 stars. Waste of money on something I was really excited about receiving. This should have been caught during the authentication process. Will not buy from stockx again.
title: Felt misguided by product

author: Garrett
text: Ok You put in almost 100 more dollars buying And loosing a hundred selling a pair .Price doesn't make much sense.
title: It's Ok How's it works?!.

author: Chanda
text: Until I received my product this is what they will get! Right now I'm thinking it's a scam!
title: Until I received my product this is…

author: Leo
text: I ordered my shoes on the 28.3.22 and today is the 9.4.22 and the shoes are still on transit to stock x
title: I ordered my shoes on the 28.3.22 and…

author: Julia
text: Hate that there is no exchanges.  Our shoe is too small and are now stuck with $130 shoes!
title: Hate that there is no exchanges

author: Julia
text:
Ordered a watch, was shipped from Hing Kong without customs paperwork. Bought it about 3 weeks ago, and it's still in customs. I had to fill out paperwork for seller, and it's challenging with watches cuz so many parts are taxed differently. Like, you'd better know the price of the strap! 
Tried to email stockx, but email went to a Google group. Holding out hope it clears customs this month! And, I see ebay sales that ate not reflected in the sales at stockx. Curious, why?
title: Watch waiting in customs

author: Nickee Danel
text: Not shopping here again.
title: Not shopping here again

author: denysse
text: It told me my shoes would arrive april 8 but they still haven’t arrived
title: It told me my shoes would arrive april…

author: Jason
text: Its been 2 weeks and counting and I havent receive my item. Worst experience. I should have went to Stadiumgoods if this would be the outcome.
title: Its been 2 weeks and counting and I…

author: James
text: No where did it say that I cannot cancel my order. I selected size 11 and then it said best deal was a lower price.  It switched to size 4.  I own a pair of size 4 when I am an 11.
title: Bait and switch
